document_data.caption: The location of Coopers' Rest (labeled 255) on a circa [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.name: Coopers' Rest
document_data.mainbody: '''Coopers' Rest''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Coopers' Guild]].
document_data.Location: This building was located along [[Pressbow Lane]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
